project.title: Game development with XNA and C# with Visual Studio

description.point: Participated in a group of six to rapidly design and implement an RPG in three weeks.
Created the game art and sprite movements using a combination of canvas drawing and Photoshop.
Designed and implemented game menu navigation.
Completed almost fully functional game; difficulty wasn't balanced and more enemy content was required. Received an A.

project.title: Creation of a media library GUI with C#

description.point: Collaborated within a group consisting of two additional members for a User Interface class to design and code a media library GUI.
Developed using WinForm controls using both graphical (Visual Studio) and programmatic methods.
Combined contents from multiple directories into aggregate front end view.
End result was a usable media library GUI for content aggregation. Received an A.

description.point: Utilized the Java programming language via the Eclipse IDE to communicate directly with MySQL database using string queries.
Designed database schema to represent classmates and performed queries against the data to create and read rows.
Compared search Algorithms with Ruby: insertion sort and shell sort.
Measured the runtimes of each sort, ran data of varying sizes, and analyzed the data for Analysis of Algorithms course.
